banners:
WARNING If the banner uses symbols (★ or & for example) and is a Step Up, Record Crystal, or Step Up v2 scout, refrain from using those symbols and use the names instead.
i.e. - "5★ Upgrade Vote Scout" -> "5 Star Upgrade Vote Scout" - "Memory of Friendship & Passing of Time" -> "Memory of Friendship and Passing of Time"
Doing this will ensure that there will be no errors when parsing the Banners.xml file. <-->
BANNER TYPES As of this writing, The following banner types are available:
0) Normal (Static scout rates, nothing special) 1) Step Up (Increased gold character scout rate per step, resets at 5) 2) Record Crystal (Get record crystals every multi scout to use in a guaranteed scout) 3) Step Up v2 (Increased platinum character scout rate per step, repeats at 6) 4) Birthday Step Up (125 MD scout on step 1, 2.0x rates for gold and platinum on step 3, resets at 3) 5) Record Crystal v2 (Same as Record Crystal, but 125 MD for the first scout.) 6) Memorial Scout (Static scout rates, single pulls only.) 7) Step Up v3 (125 MD scout on step 1, 2.0x rates for platinum on step 3, resets at 3) 8) Record Crystal v3 (Same as Record Crystal v2, but get 1-5 RC back every record crystal scout) 9) Event (Free, single pulls only, and no hacking crystals on duplicate characters) 10) SAO Game 5th Anniversary Step Up (Same rates as Step Up v2, just different MD costs) 11) Record Crystal v4 (Same as Record Crystal v3, but platinum base rates have increased by 1.5x) 12) Step Up v4 (Same as Step Up v2, but 50% discount on Step 1 and 3 and increased platinum base rates by 1.5x) 13) Step Up v5 (Same as Step Up v2, but 50% discount on Step 1 and increased platinum base rates by 1.5x) 14) SAO Game 5th Anniversary Step Up v2 (Same as SAO Game 5th Anniversary Step Up, but increased platinum base rates by 1.5x)
0) Normal (Static scout rates, nothing special) 1) Step Up (100 MD scout on step 1, 2.0x rates for gold weapon on step 3) 2) GGO Step Up (100 MD scout w/ guaranteed Copper+ Automatic Rifle, 1.5x rates for Gold on step 3, Guaranteed Gold on step 5, and 2.0x rates for Gold on step 6, repeats at 6)
- "GoldBanner" (Included in the pool for Record Crystal guaranteed scouts) - "GoldBannerv2" (Included in the pool for Record Crystal v2 guaranteed scouts)
Type the desired number between the area in a banner. <-->
